statements: SELECT * FROM EducationalInterventionsData WHERE intervention_id = 1
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_type FROM EducationalInterventionsData WHERE student_id = 123
SELECT intervention_date, intervention_outcome FROM EducationalInterventionsData ORDER BY intervention_date DESC
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_outcome FROM EducationalInterventionsData WHERE intervention_type = 'Tutoring' ORDER BY intervention_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS intervention_count FROM EducationalInterventionsData WHERE student_id = 456
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_type FROM EducationalInterventionsData WHERE intervention_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EducationalInterventionsData WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY intervention_date DESC;
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_outcome FROM EducationalInterventionsData WHERE intervention_type = 'Mathematics' AND intervention_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interventions FROM EducationalInterventionsData;
SELECT DISTINCT intervention_type FROM EducationalInterventionsData ORDER BY intervention_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM InterventionResults;
SELECT student_id, impact_score, intervention_type FROM InterventionResults WHERE intervention_type='Math';
SELECT student_id, intervention_type, intervention_date FROM InterventionResults WHERE impact_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, intervention_type, intervention_date FROM InterventionResults ORDER BY intervention_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, teacher_name FROM StudentInfo;
SELECT * FROM InterventionResults WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY intervention_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentInfo WHERE grade_level = 'Grade 10' AND teacher_name = 'Mr. Smith';
SELECT student_name, intervention_type, impact_score FROM StudentInfo INNER JOIN InterventionResults ON StudentInfo.student_id = InterventionResults.student_id ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, intervention_type, intervention_date FROM StudentInfo INNER JOIN InterventionResults ON StudentInfo.student_id = InterventionResults.student_id WHERE impact_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM InterventionResults WHERE intervention_date >= '2022-01-01' AND intervention_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT score, evaluation_date FROM StudentRecords ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, score FROM Students JOIN StudentRecords ON Students.student_id = StudentRecords.student_id WHERE evaluation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, course_name, score FROM Students JOIN StudentRecords ON Students.student_id = StudentRecords.student_id WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, evaluation_date FROM Students JOIN StudentRecords ON Students.student_id = StudentRecords.student_id WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT assessment_type, assessment_date, score FROM Assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Midterm' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, assessment_type, assessment_date, score FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Assessments ON Students.student_id = Assessments.student_id AND Enrollments.course_id = Assessments.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, assessment_type, assessment_date, score FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Assessments ON Students.student_id = Assessments.student_id AND Enrollments.course_id = Assessments.course_id WHERE score > 80;

SELECT student_name, course_name, assessment_type, assessment_date, score FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Assessments ON Students.student_id = Assessments.student_id AND Enrollments.course_id = Assessments.course_id ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Student_Profiles;
SELECT student_id, gender, age FROM Student_Profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_id, grade_level FROM Student_Profiles WHERE gender='F';
SELECT intervention_type, rating FROM Intervention_Ratings WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT log_id, intervention_type, intervention_timestamp FROM Intervention_Log ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Intervention_Ratings WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT intervention_type, COUNT(*) FROM Intervention_Log GROUP BY intervention_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT student_id, intervention_type, rating FROM Intervention_Ratings JOIN Intervention_Log ON Intervention_Ratings.student_id = Intervention_Log.student_id WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY student_id, intervention_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM Student_Profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age >= 15 AND grade_level = '10th Grade';

SELECT Student_Profiles.student_id, gender, age, grade_level, COUNT(*) as intervention_count FROM Student_Profiles JOIN Intervention_Log ON Student_Profiles.student_id = Intervention_Log.student_id GROUP BY Student_Profiles.student_id ORDER BY intervention_count DESC;
